Verses: 1 andhiyogiyaa Pattanaththilulla Sabaiyile Barnabaavum, Neekar Ennappatta Simiyonum, Sirene Ooraanaagiya Loogiyum, Kaarpangu Dhesaadhibadhiyaagiya Erodhudanekooda Valarkkappatta Manaayeenum, Savulum, Theerkkadharisigalaayum Podhagargalaayum Irundhaargal.

2 avargal Karththarukku Aaraadhanai Seydhu, Ubavaasiththukkondirukkirabodhu: Barnabaavaiyum Savulaiyum Naan Azhaiththa Oozhiyaththukkaaga Avargalaip Piriththuvidungal Endru Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Thiruvulampatrinaar.
3 appozhudhu Ubavaasiththu Jebampanni, Avargalmel Kaigalai Vaiththu, Avargalai Anuppinaargal.
4 appadiye Avargal Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Anuppappattuch Selukkiyaa Pattanaththukku Vandhu, Kappal Eri, Angirundhu Seeppurutheevukkup Ponaargal.
5 saalami Pattanaththil Vandhabodhu Avargal Yoodharudaiya Jeba Aalayangalil Dhevavasanaththaip Pirasangiththaargal. Yovaanum Avargalukku Udhavikkaaranaayirundhaan.
6 avargal Paappo Pattanam Varaikkum Theevaik Kadandhuvandhabodhu, Paryesu Ennum Perkonda Maayaviththaikkaaranum Kallath Theerkkadharisiyumaana Oru Yoodhanaik Kandaargal.

7 avan Vivegamulla Manushanaagiya Serkiyupavul Ennum Adhibadhiyudanekooda Irundhaan. Andha Adhibadhi Barnabaavaiyum Savulaiyum Azhaippiththu, Avargalidaththil Dhevavasanaththaik Ketka Aasaiyaayirundhaan.
8 maayaviththaikkaaran Endru Arththankollum Peraiyudaiya Andha Elimaa Enbavan Adhibadhiyai Visuvaasaththinindru Thiruppumpadi Vagaithedi, Avargalodu Edhirththunindraan.
9 appozhudhu Pavul Endru Sollappatta Savul Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Niraindhavanaai Avanai Utruppaarththu:
10 ellaak Kabadamum Ellaap Pollaangum Niraindhavane, Pisaasin Magane, Needhikkellaam Pagaignane, Karththarudaiya Semmaiyaana Vazhigalaip Purattuvadhil Oyamaattaayo?

11 idho, Ippozhudhe, Karththarudaiya Kai Unmel Vandhirukkiradhu, Sila Kaalam Sooriyanaik Kaanaamal Nee Kurudanaayiruppaai Endraan. Udane Mandhaaramum Irulum Avanmel Vizhundhadhu; Avan Thadumaari, Kailaaku Kodukkiravargalaith Thedinaan.
12 appozhudhu Adhibadhi Sambaviththadhaik Kandu, Karththarudaiya Ubadhesaththaikkuriththu Adhisayappattu, Visuvaasiththaan.

13 pinbu Pavulum Avanaich Serndhavargalum Paappo Pattanaththaivittuk Kappal Erip Pambiliyaavilirukkum Perke Pattanaththukku Vandhaargal. Yovaan Avargalai Vittup Pirindhu, Erusalemukkuth Thirumbipponaan.
14 avargal Perke Pattanaththaivittup Purappattu, Piseedhiyaa Naattilulla Andhiyogiyaavukku Vandhu, Oivunaalile Jebaaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Utkaarndhaargal.

15 niyaayappiramaanamum Theerkkadharisana Aagamamum Vaasiththumudinthapinbu: Sagodharare, Neengal Janangalukkup Buththisolla Virumbinaal Sollungal Endru Sollumpadi Jebaaalayaththalaivargal Avargalidaththil Aal Anuppinaargal.
16 appozhudhu Pavul Ezhundhirundhu, Kaiyamarththi: Isravelare, Dhevanukkup Bayandhu Nadakkira Sagala Janangale, Kelungal.

17 isravelaraagiya Indha Janaththinudaiya Dhevan Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalaith Therindhukondu, Egipdhu Dhesaththil Avargal Paradhesigalaaich Sanjariththabodhu Janangalai Uyarththi, Thamadhu Puyabalaththinaale Adhilirundhu Avargalaip Purappadappanni,
18 naarpadhu Varushakaalamaai Vanaandharaththil Avargalai Aadhariththu,
19 kaanaan Dhesaththil Ezhu Jaadhigalai Azhiththu, Avargaludaiya Dhesaththai Ivargalukkuch Sudhandharamaagap Pangittukkoduththu,
20 pinbu Erakkuraiya Naanootraimbadhu Varushakaalamaai Saamuvel Theerkkadharisivaraikkum Avargalukku Niyaayaadhibadhigalai Erpaduththivandhaar.
21 adhumudhal Thangalukku Oru Raajaavendumendru Kettukkondaargal; Appadiye Dhevan Benyameen Koththiraththaanaagiya Keesudaiya Kumaaranaana Savulai Naarpadhu Varushakaalamaai Avargalukkuk Koduththaar.

22 pinbu Avar Avanaith Thalli, Thaaveedhai Avargalukku Raajaavaaga Erpaduththi, Eesaayin Kumaaranaagiya Thaaveedhai En Irudhayaththukku Etravanaagak Kanden; Enakkuch Siththamaanavaigalaiyellaam Avan Seyvaan Endru Avanaikkuriththuch Saatchiyung Koduththaar.
23 avanudaiya Sandhadhiyile Dhevan Thamadhu Vaakkuththaththaththinpadiye Isravelukku Ratchagaraaga Yesuvai Ezhumbappanninaar.
24 ivar Velippaduvadharku Munne Mananthirumpudhalukketra Gnaanasnaanaththaikkuriththu Yovaan Isravelar Yaavarukkum Pirasangiththaan.

25 yovaan Than Panividai Ottaththai Niraivetrugirabodhu: Neengal Ennai Yaar Endru Ninaikkireergal, Naan Avar Alla, Idho, Enakkuppin Oruvar Varugiraar, Avarudaiya Paadharatchaiyai Avizhkkiradharkum Naan Paaththiran Alla Endraan.
26 sagodharare, Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyil Pirandhavargale, Dhevanukkup Bayandhunadakkiravargale, Indha Ratchippin Vasanam Ungalukku Anuppappattirukkiradhu.

27 erusalemil Kudiyirukkiravargalum Avargal Adhigaarigalum Avarai Ariyaamalum, Oivunaaldhorum Vaasikkappadugira Theerkkadharisigalin Vaakkiyangalai Ariyaamalum, Avarai Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerththadhinaal Andha Vaakkiyangalai Niraivetrinaargal.
28 maranaththirku Edhuvaanadhondrum Avaridaththil Kaanaadhirundhum, Avaraik Kolaiseyyumpadikkup Pilaaththuvai Vendikkondaargal.
29 avaraikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkiravaigal Yaavaiyum Avargal Niraivetrinapinbu, Avarai Maraththilirundhu Irakki, Kallaraiyile Vaiththaargal.
30 dhevano Avarai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppinaar.
31 thammudanekoodak Galileyaavilirundhu Erusalemukkup Ponavargalukku Avar Aneganaal Dharisanamaanaar; Avargale Janangalukku Munbaaga Avarukkuch Saatchigalaayirukkiraargal.
32 neer Ennudaiya Kumaaran, Indru Naan Ummai Janippiththen Endru Irandaam Sangeedhaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye,

33 yesuvai Ezhuppinadhinaale Dhevan Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukku Arulichseydha Vaakkuththaththaththai Avargaludaiya Pillaigalaagiya Namakku Niraivetrinaar Endru Naangalum Ungalukkuch Suviseshamaai Arivikkirom.

34 ini Avar Azhivukkutpadaadhapadikku Avarai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppinaar Enbadhaikkuriththu: Thaaveedhukku Arulina Nichchayamaana Kirubaigalai Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyiduven Endru Thiruvulampatrinaar.
35 andriyum, Ummudaiya Parisuththar Azhivaik Kaanavotteer Endru Veroru Sangeedhaththil Solliyirukkiradhu.
36 thaaveedhu Than Kaalaththile Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadi Avarukku Oozhiyanjseydhapinbu Niththiraiyadaindhu, Thanpidhaakkalidaththile Serkkappattu, Azhivaik Kandaan.
37 dhevanaal Ezhuppappattavaro Azhivaik Kaanavillai.
38 aadhalaal Sagodharare, Ivar Moolamaai Ungalukkup Paavamannippu Undaagum Endru Arivikkappadugiradhendrum,

39 moseyin Niyaayappiramaanaththinaale Neengal Evaigalinindru Vidudhalaiyaagi Needhimaangalaakkappadakkoodaadhirundhadho, Visuvaasikkiravan Evanum Avaigalinindru Ivaraale Vidudhalaiyaagi Needhimaanaakkappadugiraan Endrum Ungalukkuth Therindhirukkakkadavadhu.
40 andriyum, Theerkkadharisigalin Pusthagaththile:

41 asattaikaarare, Paarungal, Biramiththu Azhindhupongal! Ungal Naatkalil Oru Kiriyaiyai Naan Nadappippen, Oruvan Adhai Ungalukku Vivariththuch Sonnaalum Neengal Visuvaasikkamaatteergal Endru Solliyirukkirapadi, Ungalukku Neridaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal Endraan.
42 avargal Yoodharudaiya Jebaaalayaththilirundhu Purappadugaiyil, Aduththa Oivunaalile Indha Vasanangalaith Thangalukkuch Sollavendum Endru Purajaadhiyaar Vendikkondaargal.

43 jebaaalayaththil Koodina Sabai Kalaindhuponapinbu, Yoodharilum Yoodhamaarkkaththamaindha Bakthiyullavargalilum Anegar Pavulaiyum Barnabaavaiyum Pinpatrinaargal. Avargaludane Ivargal Pesi, Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyile Nilaikondirukkumpadi Avargalukkup Buththisonnaargal.
44 aduththa Oivunaalile Konjankuraiyap Pattanaththaaranaivarum Dhevavasanaththaik Ketkumpadi Koodivandhaargal.
45 yoodhargal Janakkoottangalaik Kandabodhu Poraamaiyinaal Niraindhu, Pavulinaal Sollappattavaigalukku Edhiridaiyaaip Pesi, Virodhiththuth Dhooshiththaargal.

46 appozhudhu Pavulum Barnapaavum Dhairiyankondu Avargalai Nokki: Mudhalaavadhu Ungalukke Dhevavasanaththaich Sollavendiyadhaayirundhadhu; Neengalo Adhaith Thalli, Ungalai Niththiyajeevanukku Abaaththiraraagath Theerththukkollugirapadiyinaal, Idho, Naangal Purajaadhiyaaridaththil Pogirom.

47 neer Boomiyin Kadaisibariyandhamum Ratchippaayirukkumpadi Ummai Jaadhigalukku Oliyaaga Vaiththen Engira Vedhavaakkiyaththinpadi Karththar Engalukkuk Kattalaiyittirukkirapadiyinaal Ippadich Seygirom Endraargal.
48 purajaadhiyaar Adhaik Kettuch Sandhoshappattu, Karththarudaiya Vasanaththai Magimaippaduththinaargal. Niththiya Jeevanukku Niyamikkappattavargal Evargalo Avargal Visuvaasiththaargal.
49 karththarudaiya Vasanam Aththesamengum Pirasiththamaayitru.

50 yoodhargal Bakthiyum Ganamumulla Sthireegalaiyum Pattanaththu Mudhalaaligalaiyum Eduththuvittu, Pavulaiyum Barnabaavaiyum Thunbappaduththumpadi Seydhu, Thangal Ellaigalukkup Purambaaga Avargalaith Thuraththivittaargal.
51 ivargal Thangal Kaalgalil Padindha Thoosiyai Avargalukku Edhiraaga Udharippottu, Ikkoniyaa Pattanaththukkup Ponaargal.
52 seeshargal Sandhoshaththinaalum Parisuththa Aaviyinaalum Nirappappattaargal.
